DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , pharmacodynamics , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , efficacy single agent idelalisib combination chemotherapy adult metastatic pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma . This study also define maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) idelalisib combination chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Study Single Agent Idelalisib Followed Idelalisib Combination With Chemotherapy Adults With Metastatic Pancreatic Ductal Adenocarcinoma
